Title: Truth & Consequences
Plot: Peter travels to Primatech in Texas to destroy the virus, but not everything is what it seems. Hiro continues the pursuit of his father's killer, while Matt pursues the last Company member in the photo. Nikki is reunited with Micah but has bad news, while Maya has to choose to remain with Alejandro, or go with Sylar.
GuestStars: Stephen Tobolowsky (Bob), Joanna Cassidy (Victoria Pratt), Ashley Crow (Sandra Bennet), Nicholas D'agosto (West Rosen), Shalim Ortiz (Alejandro Herrera), Jaime Ray Newman (Victoria Pratt), Eijiro Ozaki (Kai
